analysis.description: PlayHallToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/11/0x35c3d102efa5c117afdd9631cbdf3a1a6daa0f5c.sol#412-425) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in SaleBase.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0x35c3d102efa5c117afdd9631cbdf3a1a6daa0f5c.sol#585-600):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculateTokenAmount(weiAmount,weiRaised) (/unique_chucks/11/0x35c3d102efa5c117afdd9631cbdf3a1a6daa0f5c.sol#593-596)
	- mintTokenToBuyer(beneficiary,tokenAmount,weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/11/0x35c3d102efa5c117afdd9631cbdf3a1a6daa0f5c.sol#596-597)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/11/0x35c3d102efa5c117afdd9631cbdf3a1a6daa0f5c.sol#596-597)
empty in PlayHallToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/11/0x35c3d102efa5c117afdd9631cbdf3a1a6daa0f5c.sol#215-216) is a local variable never initialiazed
empty in PlayHallToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/11/0x35c3d102efa5c117afdd9631cbdf3a1a6daa0f5c.sol#260) is a local variable never initialiazed

SaleBase.mintTokenToBuyer (/unique_chucks/11/0x35c3d102efa5c117afdd9631cbdf3a1a6daa0f5c.sol#600-616) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokenAmount,true) (/unique_chucks/11/0x35c3d102efa5c117afdd9631cbdf3a1a6daa0f5c.sol#610-611)
